assetsCarousel.title: How it works
assetsCarousel.description: Our partnered stores pay us a commission when you shop through ShopDonation. We turn that commission into a donation for your chosen cause, at no extra cost to you.

assetsCarousel.title: 100% transparency
assetsCarousel.description: ShopDonation provides 100% transparency so users and causes can fully track and confirm donations.

assetsCarousel.title: Structural donations
assetsCarousel.description: ShopDonation is the only international platform where causes can receive structural donations from multiple countries. Shoppers can support their cause from anywhere in the world!

causeCarousel.name: Oxfam Novib
causeCarousel.description: Stichting Babyspullen zet zich in om het effect van armoede op baby’s en jonge kinderen te verminderen.
